column1: The '''''Tolkien Calendar 1997''''' was the official Tolkien calendar published by [[HarperCollins]] on [[17 June]] [[1996]]. It features art by [[John Howe]] based on ''[[The Hobbit]]'', ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]'', ''[[The Silmarillion]]'' and ''[[Sir Gawain and the Green Knight]]''.
